Hello,

The package of the order 40747549 could be not delivered because the letter box is not accessible.

Please ask your customer to reschedule the delivery with the carrier.

Thank you.

Valérie DECAMPS

Hello, 

I hope you are well.

Thank you for your feedback and cooperation.

I have just taken the necessary steps on my side and will keep you informed as soon as I have any new information.

I wish you a pleasant day.

Best regards,
Fifaliana from Back Market Customer Service
